bloodbath.title: The Bloodbath
bloodbath.description: As the tributes stand on their platforms, the signal sounds.

nonfatal.msg: {0} grabs a weapon and retreats.
{0} and {1} fight for supplies. {0} gives up and retreats.
{0} finds {weapon_any}.
{0} runs into the forest and hides.
{0} takes {weapon_any} from the supply pile.
{0} rips {weapon_any} out of {1}'s hands.
{0} finds a canteen of {liquid_any}.
{0} hides behind a tree.
{0} gathers as much {food_any} as they can carry.
{0} finds a cache of {food_any}.
{0} clutches {weapon_any} and runs away.
{0}, {1}, and {2} work together to raid the supplies.
{0} runs away with {weapon_any} and a backpack.
{0} snatches {weapon_any} and a water bottle.
{0} finds some {food_bad} but takes it anyway.
{0} grabs an empty container, not realizing it's useless.
{0} breaks {1}'s nose for a piece of {food_any}.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} share everything they gathered before scattering.
{0} receives {weapon_any} from a hidden cache.
{0} grabs some {food_any} while {1} gets {weapon_any}.
{0} scares {1} away from the supply pile.
{0} grabs a shield and retreats.
{0} snatches {weapon_any}.
{0} discovers a secret passage through the rocks.
{0} finds {weapon_poison} and immediately feels more confident.
{0} grabs {weapon_trap} from behind a tree.
{0}, {1}, {2}, and {3} form a temporary alliance to secure the supplies.
{0} dives into the underbrush and disappears from sight.
{0} squeezes through a narrow gap and finds a hidden stash.
{0} and {1} discover {weapon_explosive} at the same time. They agree to share... for now.
{0} finds {weapon_projectile} and quickly retreats to higher ground.
{0} secures {weapon_cutting} and {weapon_piercing} before others arrive.
{0} and {1} work together to carry a heavy supply crate.
{0} locates medical supplies and bandages their wounds.
{0} discovers a map of the arena and memorizes it quickly.

fatal.msg: {0} steps off their platform too soon and is eliminated.
{0} is crushed by falling debris.
{0} accidentally steps into {hazard_natural}.
{0} cannot handle the arena's conditions and succumbs to exposure.
{0} is swept away by a sudden flood.
{0} slips on {hazard_natural} and falls to their death.
{0} stabs {1} with {weapon_piercing}.
{0} finds {1} hiding and eliminates them.
{0} finds {1} hiding, but {1} strikes first.
{0} pushes {1} into the path of {hazard_creature}.
{0} drowns {1} in a pool of {liquid_bad}.

{0} ambushes {1} with {weapon_any}.
{0} throws {weapon_projectile} at {1}.
{0} sets {weapon_trap} and {1} falls into it.
{0} tries to kill {1} with {weapon_projectile} but it ricochets.
{0} accidentally triggers {weapon_explosive} while fighting {1}.
{0} accidentally triggers {weapon_explosive}. {1}, {2}, and {3} are caught in the blast.
{0} triggers an avalanche, killing themselves, {1}, and {2}.
{0} uses {weapon_explosive} without understanding the consequences. {1} and {2} are caught in the blast.
{0} hits {1} with {weapon_fire}. The screaming is brief.
A rockslide crushes {0} and {1}.
{0} shoves {1} into a cascade of falling rocks.
{0} panics and throws {weapon_poison} wildly. It hits {1} directly.
{0} sets off {weapon_trap} that catches {1}, {2}, and {3}.

day.description: The tributes continue their struggle for survival.

{0} and {1} form an alliance.
{0} hunts for other tributes.
{0} tends to their wounds.
{0} and {1} share some {food_any}.

{0} stays awake all night, watching for threats.

feast.description: Supplies appear in the arena. The tributes converge.

feast.title: The Midnight Cache

feast.title: The Sponsor's Gift

fatal.msg: {0} discovers what happens when you fall into {liquid_bad}.
{0} accidentally kills themselves with {weapon_any}.
{0} poisons {1}'s food, but grabs the wrong portion and dies.
{0} poisons {1}'s food. They eat it and die.
{0} attempts to climb a cliff but falls on {1}, killing them both.
{0} eats {food_bad} and doesn't survive the night.
{0} drinks from a suspicious puddle of {liquid_bad}.
{0} is crushed by a falling {food_any}. The irony is not lost.
{0} slips on {hazard_natural} and breaks their neck.
{0} freezes solid after wandering into {hazard_weather}.
{0} and {1} duel with {weapon_any}. Neither survives.

{0} engages {1} in combat with {weapon_any}. {0} emerges victorious.
{0} mistakes {liquid_bad} for {liquid_good}. A fatal error.
